page.title: 15CLUBS AND ENTERTAINMENT.
page.content: THE{MOST FREQUENT VENUE}FOR CLUBS IS THE{DUCHY HALL IN STOKECLIMSLAND. WEEKLY EVENTS INCLUDE{YOGA,KARATE}AND YOUTH CLUB.MONTHY MEETINGS IN THE HALL INCLUDE{W.I.,BRITISH LEGION (WOMENS {GROUP)}AND THE{GARDENING}CLUB.ANOTHER VENUE IS THE{PRIMARY SCHOOL}WHERE WEEKLY MEETINGS OF{BROWNIES,CUBS AND {GUIDES}TAKE PLACE.THERE ARE ACTIVE {POLITICAL GROUPS}IN THE AREA WITH {LIBERAL/S.D.P.AND CONSERVATIVE}BEING WELL SUPPORTED.THE{SPORTS CLUB}AT {LUCKETT}AND THE{STOKE CLIMSLAND SPORTS {AND SOCIAL CLUB}HAVE MEMBERS WHO ENJOY{SOCCER,CRICKET,DARTS AND {SNOOKER.BOTH CLUBS ARE LICENSED}AND AS SUCH ARE THE{ONLY LICENSED PREMISES IN {THE PARISH.THE OVER SIXTIES GROUP}MEET MONTHY AT{STOKE S.AND S. CLUB.A BRIDGE {CLUB}MEET WEEKLY AND THE{BELL RINGERS HAVE A WEEKLY PRACTICE IN THE{TOWER.
